member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetPagedCompanies(crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest)
member.summary: Gets a paged list of companies assigned to the current user.
member.param: Contains information for the current page and page count.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetCompaniesFull
member.summary: Gets a list of all companies assigned to the current user including all addresses and contacts.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetPagedCompaniesFull(crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest)
member.summary: Gets a paged list of all companies assigned to the current user including all addresses and contacts.
member.param: Contains information for the current page and page count.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetPagedAllCompanies(crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest)
member.summary: Gets a paged list of all companies.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetPagedAllCompaniesFull(crmSeries.Core.Logic.Queries.PagedQueryRequest)
member.summary: Gets a paged list of all companies including all addresses and contacts.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetCompany(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a single company by id.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.CompaniesController.GetCompanyFull(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a single company by id including all addresses and contacts.

member.summary: Gets a list of all contacts assigned to the current user.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.ContactsController.GetContactsById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a contact entity based on the contact entity's contact id.

member.summary: Updates a contact object based on the data in the request.

member.name: M:crmSeries.API.Controllers.ContactsController.Delete(System.Int32)

member.summary: Adds a Lead to the system.
member.remarks: Along with name, this API requires that either phone number or E-Mail be passed into the request.
